title: Enchanting Pink Tourmaline Kundan Stud Earrings
materials: 18K Rose Gold with high Hyderabadi polish
featuring a central cabochon-cut Pink Tourmaline (approximately 2 carats) surrounded by a halo of brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
features: Modern halo design with a central pink tourmaline cabochon stone. The rose gold setting and diamond halo give it a contemporary and eye-catching look. The open-back setting allows maximum light to permeate the gemstones, enhancing their natural brilliance.
occasions: or a special gift for a loved one. These earrings can be a great addition to both traditional South Indian attire and modern outfits.
description: This captivating earring combines classic elegance with a modern twist. The vibrant pink tourmaline and sparkling diamonds will enhance any look.
